about.summary: Create simple maps; add sub-plots like pie plots to a map or any other plot; format, plot and export gridded data. The package was developed for displaying fisheries data but most functions can be used for more generic data visualisation.

Create simple maps; add sub-plots like pie plots to a map or any other plot; format, plot and export gridded data. The package was developed for displaying fisheries data but most functions can be used for more generic data visualisation.

name: r-mapplots
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.5.2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-mapplots
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/mapplots_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/mapplots/mapplots_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: ed0e151d6865549d1a10882984a7fb29bc89a7b94ad69e512f90937b981c8a18

build:
  noarch: generic
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 0
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:

  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('mapplots')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('mapplots')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=mapplots
  license: GPL (>= 2)
  summary: 'Create simple maps; add sub-plots like pie plots to a map or any other plot; format, plot and export gridded data. The package was developed for displaying fisheries data but most functions can be used for more generic data visualisation. '
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
